text:
Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA lyase deficiency
What is (are) Czech dysplasia ?,"Czech dysplasia is an inherited condition that affects joint function and bone development. People with this condition have joint pain (osteoarthritis) that begins in adolescence or early adulthood. The joint pain mainly affects the hips, knees, shoulders, and spine and may impair mobility. People with Czech dysplasia often have shortened bones in their third and fourth to
